Class.ClassComment: MBeanServerLookup /** * Implementors of this should return an MBeanServer to which MBeans will be registered. * @author Mircea.Markus@jboss.com * @see org.infinispan.jmx.PlatformMBeanServerLookup * @since 4.0 * @public */

Method.MethodComment: /** * Retrieves an {@link MBeanServer} instance. * @param properties properties to configure the MBeanServer instance * @return an MBeanServer instance */
